name: Good Morning Drifter
description:
Even if you always stay a member of racing club,

There will be times when you won't be able to participate.

But don't worry, the club will wait for you.

So just grab a pear, watch the races, and hang out with friends.

CONTROLS

W / D / S / A – move
LMB or E – action
ESC or ENTER – pause / unpause game
LEFT SHIFT – run

FAMICASE

Good Morning Drifter is an AGBIC 2018 submission based on the original Famicase cover design by  Kyle McKernan / @spacetreasured:
